title: MoviTv Web App
description: Movitv is a responsive web app that displays trending movies, allows users to search for TV series and movies, and features login/register and bookmarking functionalities.

title: ShopNest Ecommerse site
description: It is an ecommerce website shows a variety of products like electronics, sports, Groceries, etc. Users can login and add to cart, make orders , manage profiles.

title: QuizeMaker
description: This is a project use to create quizzes, store them in local storage and solve. It is interactive web site that simplifies the work of creating quizzes online.

title: Weather App
description: This is simple weather application shows weather data on searching location, it fetches user location and render weather data  on load it user weather API to fetch weather data.
